text:
He has been suspicious and fanciful for a long time. 

“Sometimes he is cold and inhumanly callous,” Razumihin said. 

Pulcheria Alexandrovna sighed. “God grant it may help him.” 

Razumihin glanced at Avdotya Romanovna. She walked back and forth. 

Her arms were folded, lips pressed tight. 

“Why doesn’t he listen?” she asked, her voice tense. 

Razumihin noticed their poverty. 

“Had she been dressed like a queen…” he thought. 

But she wasn’t. 

She continued pacing, deep in thought.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov exhibits a complex personality, alternating between noble kindness and cold callousness, while his family hopes for a positive change with the arrival of a visitor.
